channel.title: About when your servers are online!
channel.description:
so right i was wondering when people make a server and make it online and other people start going on it do they like leave the pc on all day and leave the server running or do they uno make certain times that they will start and close the server because i am making a server and i would def not be able to keep it open like 24/7, i would be able to have it up and running everyday but at certain times. i keep thinking that if i do that then no one will join and play it coz it wont be online 24/7
anybody got any comments or advice on this issue??? luke

item.title: About when your servers are online!
item.dc:creator: @luke12345 luke12345
item.description:
@luke12345 wrote:

ty for the advide big help

Read full topic
item.source: About when your servers are online!

item.title: About when your servers are online!
item.dc:creator: @_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro {S-Unit} Impulse Arrow
item.description:
@_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro wrote:

Most of these servers arn’t 24/7, My server wasn’t and I have had over 100 people join…
